description: Smelt ores into metal bars and then smith those bars into armor, weapons, and other useful items.

trainingMethods.name: Smelting Bronze Bars
trainingMethods.notes: Basic smelting to create bronze bars.

trainingMethods.name: Smithing Bronze Platebodies
trainingMethods.notes: Smithing items from bars. Platebodies give good XP per bar.

trainingMethods.name: Gold Bars (Blast Furnace)
trainingMethods.notes: Fastest Smithing XP in the game. Requires paying fees or being on official worlds.

trainingMethods.name: Smithing Mithril Platebodies
trainingMethods.notes: Good XP per bar for higher level smithing.

trainingMethods.name: Adamantite Darts
trainingMethods.notes: Often profitable while training Smithing. Darts are made quickly.

trainingMethods.name: Smithing Rune Platelegs/Plateskirts
trainingMethods.notes: High level smithing, can be profitable depending on bar prices.
